plot: A workplace dispute between Leslie and Ben interferes with their personal life, Andy gets a job playing at a child's birthday party, and Ann's complaints about Chris ruins the department's "Whine and Cheese Club."

Leslie (Amy Poehler) fights with Ben (Adam Scott) over questionable sales techniques at the local farmers market. Ann searches for a way to vent about the annoying aspects of pregnancy, while April (Aubrey Plaza) supports Andy (Chris Pratt) in a new creative venture.—Anonymous
